item.title: REVEAL
item.description: Visit Projects Website REVEAL aims to advance the necessary technologies for making a higher level analysis of social media possible. The project will enable users to reveal hidden ‘modalities’ such as reputation, influence or credibility of information.at this approach will be more widely applicable to other disease areas.
